entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 11:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.9°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
